content: howl a hat and cowl pattern by andrea riddle this is a matching hat and cowl pattern that is perfect for anyone choose your favorite chunky to bulky yarn and have fun materials hat uses 1 skein of malabrigo vientos cowl uses 2 skeins of malabrigo vientos samples shown in color amphibian vientos 130 yards per 100g skein 100% superwash wool hand wash dry flat needles 16 us # 9 and us# 10 us #10 32 for magic loop at the top of the hat stitch marker and tapestry needle hat two sizes are given cast on 75 stitches for a regular adult hat cast on 80 stitches for a larger hat decreases are different for each size using a us #9 needle cast on 75 80 stitches using your preferred cast on method i used german twisted cast on join in the round being careful not to twist place stitch marker all rounds *knit 3 purl 2 * repeat continue for 12 rounds switch to us #10 needle continue in pattern until hat measures 8 from cast on edge decreases for the 80 stitch hat adult large row 1 pattern 8 st p2tog repeat row 2 and all even row through row 9 follow the pattern around knit your knits and purl your purls note the decreases will change the pattern it is important to read your knitting round 3 pattern 7 st p2tog repeat round 5 pattern 6 st p2tog repeat when stitches become stretches move to your 32 needle and start magic loop round 7 pattern 5 st p2tog repeat round 9 pattern 4 st p2tog repeat 1 round 10 knit 3 st p2tog repeat note you are now decreasing every round round 11 knit 2 st p2tog repeat round 12 knit 1 st p2tog repeat round 13 k2tog around cut yarn leaving a 6-8 tail pull through live stitches twice to bind off weave in ends using your tapestry needle decreases for the 75 stitch hat adult medium round 1 pattern 13 st p2tog round 2 and all even rounds follow the pattern around being careful to read your knitting and purling the decrease stitch round 3 pattern 12 st p2tog repeat round 5 pattern 11 st p2 decrease repeat round 7 pattern 10 st p2 decrease repeat round 9 pattern 9 st p2 decrease repeat round 11 pattern 8 st p2tog repeat round 13 pattern 7 st p2tog repeat round 14 pattern 6 st p2tog repeat note you are now decreasing every round round 15 pattern 5 st p2tog repeat round 16 pattern 4 st p2tog repeat round 17 pattern 3 st p2tog repeat round 18 pattern 2 st p2tog repeat round 19 pattern 1 st p2tog repeat round 20 knit 2tog around cut yarn
